thread.title: Big Apple Break
thread.title_full: Big Apple Break - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 728howardh
title: Big Apple Break
text: I found the hotel staff to be very helpful and energetic. The room was very clean and well laid out however would have probably been pretty tight with two adults sharing. perfect for a 2/3 night business stay and great location. I would stay here again and strongly recommend to others as i didnt manage to take advantage of the spyglass Bar or the full steak restaurant.
